author: mpo
msg: Making the SAXFragment generation benefit better from the implementation in the base class.
Important: This changes the generation of <fi:form> to group the nested widgets with a <fi:widgets>
(no longer fi:children, this affects only the people that use the forms generator,
e.g. most of the binding samples)

author: bruno
msg: Allow to set HTML Area language using a stylesheet parameter.

author: vgritsenko
msg: LinkRewriter: Added support for rewriting URLs which are embedded into
the attribute values (example: style attribute with background image URL).
Such URLs can be extracted using RE expressions and re-written, leaving
rest of the attribute value intact.
